## Source: ossf-package-analysis (98ef7d6ade8e634b82bd1d79345489c30800a8b1078467e02c1bd113b1ce0f16)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'flow-session-guard' @ 99.99.993 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
